name: Color Cards
description:
Add color cards to your Figma designs. This allows you to build a palette or showcase colors for inspiration. You can generate custom names using "The Color API" for easily adding your new colors to your library.


How to Use

Add a name for your card in the "Color Name" text box. Next, click on the color input box to select a color or enter in a hex color code in the box next to it.


Note : The hex code must include the hash # at the beginning and must have six characters following the hash. The input is case insensitive. So, both uppercase and lowercase letters are valid to be used. An invalid input will cause the card to not be generated.


Input Example :


// Valid Inputs
#adc3ec
#ADC3EC

//Invalid Inputs
#fff
e9dfea
#00000


If you check the "Use Color API?" box, a custom name will be pulled from the color API. This will overwrite the name in the "Color Name" input.
